document.full_text: eighteen-year-old twin sisters were killed on wednesday when a tree fell on their home during thunderstorms that swept through the town of ellenboro, north carolina, police said.
document.title: twin sisters die in n.c. storm after tree falls on home
lines_and_colors: eighteen-year-old twin sisters were killed on wednesday when a tree fell on their home during thunderstorms that swept through the town of ellenboro, north carolina, police said.
